title: Rotating game mode rant
body: Okay whats the point of a rotating game mode system if the same game mode is going to be going on weeks on end? Just make a consistent list in which you would use non-stop that way every game mode is on for the same amount of time.

replies.body: They mostly put the least popular modes on OCE because it would distract the playerbase away from the ranked queues if they had the popular ones.
The RGM queue schedule is the same on all regions.
Perhaps, but it seems to be driven by this phenomenon :)

The schedule hasn't changes in it's format since the queues changed. We had LotPK for so long because it's Snowdown and it was a traditionally Snowdown gamemode, just as we had Doom Bots for Harrowing.

The reason modes like URF don't see much time on the RGM queue is because it's a mode that people get burnt out on very quickly, so having more time between its appearances means more enjoyment for everyone once it does come back.
What about N.U.R.F. ? And Nemesis mode? They hardly get a go.

NURF was the April Fools joke and was the return of URF that year and not an actual gamemode. Nemesis Draft is rather unpopular and a generally unhealthy queue so likely they want to rework it before they put it back in the queue on amore regular basis, though we may see it sporadically until then.
Nemesis draft is cool! Kids have to learn to think for a change :)
If it was that easy we wouldn't have autofill below DIamond but such is life.

It's happened *once* for the (arguably) largest holiday of the year.

Get over it.
Okay I'm not saying I agree with him but it has happened at least 4-5 different times and the schedule is messed up.

Last I checked this was the first time we've had the same mode more than 2 weeks in a row since the RGM started, so I don't know where you got "it has happened at least 4-5 different times" from.

Besides, Riot stated before this all started that they were slowing down the queue while they worked on something else so I don't really think there's any reason to complain just yet. For all we know they could be working on a brand new mode or trying to improve the most popular modes ready to go for next week.

When did you check? Last snowdown, Nexus Siege, One for All, And this snowdown. That's at least 4 I can list, Seras Dragon mentioned another two, Urf twice and Doom Bots twice.

That makes 6. Again, I'm not complaining about RGM I'm just pointing out that this isn't the first time it's happened, it's also not a bad thing.

Last snowdown was *before* the RGM queue started, which was back when we only had modes when they were released (or re-released) for a couple weeks or so then everything returned to "normal". Then you consider that I had stated that "this was the first time we've had the same mode *more than 2 weeks in a row*", so your point about Nexus Siege, OFA, URF and Doombots are not relevant to what I've stated. WE also had Ascension for a couple weeks recently however that was after Riots announcement about slowing down the queue.

I certainly wouldn't say that the schedule is "messed up", it's just not how anyone would've thought it would go down during the Christmas/New Years period. No doubt Riot has had this planned for a while.
We had URF twice in a row because it was it's return and people wanted it. We had Doom Bots twice for Harrowing and have now had Poro King twice for Snowdown. I can't say I remember any others.

Not saying it's bad but this is not the first time obviously. I don't really care I like RGM the way it is but factually it's not the first time they have put one of for a few weeks.

Nexus Siege.
Last Snowdown.
Urf.
One for All.
Doom Bots.
This snowdown. 

With the exception of last snowdown (I think that might've been a solo event and not a RGM) there has been 5.

Ooo yeah I forgot about Nexus Siege, and I think you are right about last Snowdown, pretty sure it was before the era of the RGM. I have to agree with you, I pretty much like the queue the way it is. I just genuinely couldn't remember any other double ups :P
I would like it if they did that
this is not a rant at all
